name: Telop Nº01
description: Inspired by video and computer graphic styles of the 1990s and the deliberately hypnotizing abstract textile patterns commonly found on public transit seating - a design style so bizarre and hideous that it will technically never go out of fashion, as it was never in fashion in the first place. This piece is part of the “Synthetic Appeal” collectible NFT series of electronic paintings / telops created on a purely analog signal path of a holistic video synthesizer through an assemblage of signal generators, modulators, and control voltages. This is a raw and unmodified PAL capture.
